title: A Parameter-Free Classification Method with Compressors
description: The paper introduces a new method for text classification that is simpler and cheaper than traditional deep learning methods. It combines data compression with a nearest neighbor classifier and achieves competitive results even with limited data and on unseen data.

title: Snowflake ML Python SDK
description: Added Large Language Model support to Snowflake's Machine Learning Python SDK.

title: It's What Was Said
description: My LLC that focusses on building micro-SaaS solutions for small businesses.

title: ScribbleSend
description: Micro-SaaS that enhances employee experience by sending personalized greeting cards for holidays, anniversaries, and special occasions. The card content is generated using AI based on information provided by the employer.

title: Extinct Sounds
description: Wordle-like game where you have to guess the extinct sound by its name. This was a fun project to hone my Web3 development skills. The game is deployed on the Ethereum blockchain and built with Solidity, Python, and Next.js.
